chapter_reflection.speaker: Narrator
chapter_reflection.text: The weeks have changed Garrett in ways you never expected. The man who shuffled in carrying ghosts now walks with purpose, often bringing fresh-baked bread to share.

garrett_regular.speaker: Narrator
garrett_regular.text: He's become part of the cafe's rhythm - telling stories to other customers, playing with your dragon, helping in the kitchen when it gets busy. A grandfather to everyone who walks through the door.

garrett_news.speaker: Old Man Garrett
garrett_news.text: *Garrett approaches with a spring in his step* I have news! I've booked a trip. Two weeks from now. To the ocean.

garrett_explains_trip.speaker: Old Man Garrett
garrett_explains_trip.text: Eleanor and I never made it there together. But I'm going to go for both of us. I'll scatter some of her ashes there. Let her finally see the waves.

garrett_emotional.speaker: Old Man Garrett
garrett_emotional.text: *His eyes glisten, but he's smiling* It's time. Time to complete our last promise. And then... then I'll come home. Here. To my new family.

player_respond_trip.speaker: Narrator
player_respond_trip.text: What do you say to Garrett?

choices.text: We'll be here when you get back. This is your home now.
Send Eleanor our love when you see the ocean.

garrett_home.speaker: Old Man Garrett
garrett_home.text: *He embraces you* Home. I never thought I'd have another one. Eleanor was my home for fifty-two years. Now... now home is here. And memories of her. Both at once.

garrett_promise_eleanor.speaker: Old Man Garrett
garrett_promise_eleanor.text: *He laughs through tears* I will. I'll tell her all about this place. About the dragon who comforted me. About the young chef who taught an old man that letting go doesn't mean forgetting.

chapter_complete.speaker: Narrator
chapter_complete.text: Garrett's Memory Bread becomes a beloved item on your menu. Customers ask about its story, and Garrett is always happy to tell it - a tale of love, loss, and the courage to keep living.

reputation_grows.speaker: Narrator
reputation_grows.text: Word spreads of Dragon Haven Cafe - a place where the food nourishes more than just the body. Where stories are shared, and hearts are healed.

chapter_end.speaker: Narrator
chapter_end.text: Chapter 3 - Letting Go of the Past - Complete
